thread.title: Selena Gomez slams Taylor Swift, Calvin Harris' `stupid` split rumours
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez slams Taylor Swift, Calvin Harris' `stupid` split rumours

title: Selena Gomez slams Taylor Swift, Calvin Harris' `stupid` split rumours
text:
Selena Gomez slams Taylor Swift, Calvin Harris' `stupid` split rumours 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Tuesday 13th October, 2015 
Taylor Swift's best friend Selena Gomez always takes a stand for her BFF and now she has come up to deny the "stupid" break-up rumours of her singer friend and her boyfriend Calvin Harris. 
The 'Good For You' singer was taken aback when during an interview, Andy Cohen told her about the rumours and the singer said that this could not be possible since she would have known first if it were been true, News.com.au reported. 
There were rumors surfacing over the internet that Swift has reportedly dumped her DJ boyfriend and ended their six-month relationship after Harris was photographed leaving a Thai massage parlour on Hollywood's Sunset Strip. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News   "Shaandaar" alongside Alia   Clinton 'shouldn't
